entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
